description: Capacity Building for Trade Development & Integration, is a project to support implementation of priotity activities of the DTIS Action matrix in Tanzania. It focuses on dvelopment of institutional framework within the government to coordinate trade rela

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project will build capacity in the Ministry to coordinate trade related interventions, mainstream trade and support formulation of Trade Sector Development Programme which will be the main operational arm of  the Tanzania Trade Integration Strategy. It will also lay the ground for enabling Tanzania to access Enhanced Integrated Framework resources in order to address capacity issues and supply constraints issues. The project key interventions focus on horticulture, tourism (hotel classification), livestock and fisheries and capacity for Tanzania Trade Integration Strategy Coordination Office.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Trade Development & Integratio
